Name: SnowRocket
About the game: SnowRocket is a single snowmobile race for the best time. The track is tricky enough and will probably play against you. Trees and animals, sharp turns and other obstacles. Race for the best score with other players. Show who is really the best here! Currently only one racing track is available in the game. The game in a prototype state now. There is still plenty of work ahead. Feedback and review and suggestions from players will help determine the priorities for the development of the game. Please purchase this game in Early Access only if you would like to support the further development of the project. Thank you for your interest for this project.
